trans-unit.source: 👋 Welcome to TelegramDB Search Bot. This bot allows you to find public channels and groups, and see what public chats a user is in, or has been in, using a constantly updated database with 300+ million chats and 1 billion users! Use our inline queries to get user details from usernames and IDs. 🆓 Free commands: /search - Search for anything /resolve [id or username] - Resolve a username or ID /title [name] - Search for groups and channels /group [name] - Search for groups /channel [name] - Search for channels /bot [name] - Search for bots /add [username] - Add a user to TelegramDB 💲 Premium commands: /where [id or username] - Find groups in which a user has been /members [id or username] - Find members of a group /near [id or username] - Find nearest users /network [id or username] - Find nearest chats /credits - Buy credits ℹ Other commands: /faq - Frequently Asked Questions /language - Choose the language /support - Support chat for TgDB /stats - Show statistics /terms - Terms and conditions /cancel - Cancel current operation For any info or doubts join @tgdbchat
trans-unit.target: 👋 欢迎来到TelegramDB搜索机器人。 这个机器人可以让你找到公共频道和群组，并通过不断更新的数据库查看用户正在或已经参加的公共聊天记录 拥有3亿多聊天记录和10亿多用户！。 使用我们的内联查询，从用户名和ID中获取用户详情。 🆓 自由的命令。 /search - 搜索任何内容 /resolve [id或username] - 解决一个用户名或ID /title [name] - 搜索群组和频道 /group [name] - 搜索群组 /channel [name] - 搜索频道 /bot [name] - 搜索机器人 /add [username] - 向 TelegramDB 添加用户 💲 高级命令: /where [id或username] - 查找用户所在的群组 /members [id或username] - 查看群组成员 /near [id或username] - 查找最近的用户 /network [id或username] - 查找最近的聊天记录 /credits - 购买积分 ℹ 其他命令: /faq - 常见问答 /language - 选择语言 /support - TgDB 支持聊天 /stats - 显示统计信息 /terms - 条件和协议 /cancel - 取消当前操作 更多信息或疑问加入 @tgdbchat

trans-unit.source: How does it work? The bot queries a database containing public groups and users, crawled by TelegramDB. Do you really track all groups? No, tracking all groups would be impossible: we have only a part of the public groups on Telegram. How much data do you have? Check https://telegramdb.org/stats to see the latest data. What is the near command? The term "near" refers to users who have interacted with the searched user or are in common groups, such as friends. "Near" is intended as users who have interacted with each other or are part of common groups with the searched user, such as friends. It does not find chats that are geographically close. What is the network command? The network command finds the chats closest to the searched chat. It finds chats frequented by approximately the same audience of users, such as groups with the same topic, or being part of a network. It does not find chats that are geographically close. How much does where cost? Before paying to see the results, the bot will show you how many results are there, and how much does it cost. The base price for the /where command is 3 credits. In addition, every 40 results the cost increases by 1 credit. Example: 100 results cost 5 credits 3 base price + 2 (100/40 = 2.5) The price for the /members command is calculated with this formula: 3+0.6x^0.8. X is the number of results, and is rounded down. Example: 100 achievements cost 26 credits How can I delete a chat from the bot results? Send an email to webmaster@telegramdb.org, with "chat deletion request" as the subject, provide the chat id/username, and a short explanation of why the chat must be removed. Please note that the results can also include groups in which the user was present in the past, so it must be noted that a user may have been added to that group by another person without their approval.
trans-unit.target: 它是如何工作的? 机器人查询包含 公开的 群组和用户, 由TelegramDB爬取. 你真的追踪得到所有群组吗？ 不，追踪得到所有群组是不可能的: 我们在Telegram上只有一部分 公开的 群组. 你有多少数据? 点击 https://telegramdb.org/stats 去查看最新的数据. 什么是近命令？ 术语“附近”是指与搜索到的用户进行过交互或者属于共同群组（例如朋友）的用户。 “附近”意指彼此交互过的用户或者是与搜索到的用户相同的组的一部分（例如朋友）的用户。 它找不到地理位置接近的聊天。 什么是网络命令？ 网络命令查找最接近搜索到的聊天的聊天。 它发现大约相同的用户受众经常进行的聊天，例如具有相同主题的组，或者属于网络的一部分。 它找不到地理位置接近的聊天。 费用是多少？ 在付费查看结果之前，机器人会告诉你有多少结果，以及它需要多少钱。 /where 命令的基础价格为 3 积分. 此外，每40个结果成本增加1个积分。 示例: 100 结果需要 5 个积分 3 基础价格 + 2 (100/40 = 2.5) /members 命令的价格使用以下公式计算：3+0.6x^0.8。 X 是结果数，向下舍入。 例子： 100 个成就需要 26 个学分 我如何从机器人结果中删除一个会话? 发送电子邮件给网站管理员@telegramdb.org, 用 "删除会话请求" 作为主题, 提供会话 id/用户名, 和一个简短的解释为什么聊天必须删除。 请注意 结果还可能包括用户过去曾参加过的群组，因此必须注意，用户可能已在未经其批准的情况下被另一个人添加到该群组中。

trans-unit.source:
We are not Telegram, we can only answer questions related to TelegramDB!
Join @tgdbchat or write to @tgdb_support for TelegramDB.org support.
trans-unit.target:
我们不是 Telegram，我们只能回答与 TelegramDB 相关的问题！
加入 @tgdbchat 或致信 @tgdb_support 寻求 TelegramDB.org 支持。

trans-unit.target: 没有足够的组来使用此命令。

trans-unit.source: Load time:
trans-unit.target: 加载时间：

trans-unit.source: The term near refers to a virtual distance between Telegram communities, and not to the physical distance between users.
trans-unit.target: 所谓 "近 "是指 Telegram 社区之间的虚拟距离，而不是用户之间的物理距离。

trans-unit.source: Wait for the execution of the command, it may take a few minutes…
trans-unit.target: 等待命令执行，可能需要几分钟时间…

trans-unit.source: Few groups were found for this user, may show inaccurate results!
trans-unit.target: 为该用户找到的组很少，可能会显示不准确的结果！

trans-unit.source: This command is in use by too many users, try again in a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: 太多用户正在使用此命令，请几分钟后再试。

trans-unit.source: This command is limited; wait until it finishes executing the previous one.
trans-unit.target: 这条命令是有限制的，请等待它执行完前一条命令。

trans-unit.source: Did you want to execute the {command} command?
trans-unit.target: 您想执行 {command} 命令吗？

trans-unit.source: What groups is the user a member of?
trans-unit.target: 用户是哪些组的成员？

trans-unit.source: Who are the nearby users?
trans-unit.target: 附近有哪些用户？

trans-unit.source: Who are the members?
trans-unit.target: 成员有哪些？

trans-unit.source: What are the nearby chats?
trans-unit.target: 附近的聊天内容是什么？

trans-unit.source: {n_res_type, select, approximate {~{n_res}} other {{n_res}}} results - {price} credits
trans-unit.target: {n_res_type, select, approximate {~{n_res}} other {{n_res}}} 结果 - {price} 积分

trans-unit.source: The results have been truncated, to see the full results see the CSV file.
trans-unit.target: 结果已被截断，要查看完整结果，请参阅 CSV 文件。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough users to use this command.
trans-unit.target: 没有足够的用户来使用此命令。

trans-unit.target: 此聊天中发现的成员很少，可能显示不准确的结果！

trans-unit.source: This command is in use by too many users, try again in a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此命令被太多用户使用，请在几分钟后重试。

trans-unit.source: This command is limited; wait until it finishes executing the previous one.
trans-unit.target: 该命令是有限的； 等到它执行完前一个。

trans-unit.source:
This command is not available at the moment.
If you want to be notified when it will be available again, join our channel: https://t.me/tgdatabase
trans-unit.target:
该命令目前不可用。
如果您想在再次可用时收到通知，请加入我们的频道： https://t.me/tgdatabase

trans-unit.target: 通过 Telegram 用卡付款

trans-unit.target: 使用 Telegram Stars 付款

trans-unit.source: There was a problem with the payment. Please contact support with /support.
trans-unit.target: 付款有问题。 请使用 /support 联系技术支持。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, the search is too long and cannot be done.
trans-unit.target: 抱歉，搜索时间太长，无法完成。

trans-unit.source: There was a problem with the payment, it will be tried again later. If the error persists for a long time, please contact support with /support.
trans-unit.target: 付款出现问题，稍后再试。 如果错误持续很长时间，请使用 /support 联系技术支持。

trans-unit.target: 使用 PayPal 付款

trans-unit.source: Pay
trans-unit.target: 薪酬

trans-unit.source: There was an error with payment via cryptocurrency, please contact support with /support.
trans-unit.target: 通过加密货币支付时出现错误，请使用/support 联系支持人员。

trans-unit.source: Cryptocurrency payment is being processed, within a few minutes you will receive your credits.
trans-unit.target: 加密货币支付正在处理中，几分钟内您就会收到积分。

trans-unit.source: There was an error with payment via cryptocurrency, please contact support with /support.

trans-unit.target: 我们正在等待您的加密货币付款，可能需要几分钟时间。

trans-unit.source: Cryptocurrency payment is being processed, within a few minutes you will receive your credits.
trans-unit.target: 加密货币支付正在处理中，几分钟内您就会收到积分。

trans-unit.source: You only paid part of the bill in crypto, only {credits} credits were added to you.
trans-unit.target: 你只用加密货币支付了部分账单，只有 {credits} 点数被添加到了你的账户中。

trans-unit.target: 为您添加点数时出现问题，请使用 /support 联系支持人员。
